usage.cn: 如果有人愿意让你替他承担一些事情，你已经找到了深厚的友谊了。
usage.eng: When someone allows you to bear his burdens, you have found deep friendship.

usage.cn: 如果随着时间的流逝, 你发现自己和理想背道而驰, 那么就让谦逊帮助你找回曾经的自己——真正的自己。——Jessica Lange 1994年奥斯卡影后
usage.eng: As time passes, if you find you've come far away from yourself, allow the breeze of humility to remind you of who you ware — who you really are.
